New Records: Cameroon extended their dominance over Kenya with a fifth win in their nine encounters since 1972.
Key Match Events: Vincent Aboubakar scored an early penalty kick
Christian Bassogog scored a goal in the 55th minute
Kenya had only two shots on target compared to Cameroon's five
Cameroon dominated possession with 61% compared to Kenya's 39%
Pre-Game Insights: Kenya's hopes of qualification were damaged by the loss.
Post-Match Reflections: The outcome leaves Cameroon top of Group J with seven points
Kenya drops to third and must secure at least a point in the return leg.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Japoma Stadium in Douala
The first leg of a two-leg series.
